abstract: Brazilian congressional panel votes to recommend impeachment of Pres Dilma Rousseff; measure now needs two-thirds majority in full lower house vote to move to Senate.

headline.print_headline: Panel Vote Advances Rousseff Impeachment Effort
headline.main: Effort to Impeach Brazilian President Dilma Rousseff Clears Congressional Panel

snippet: Supporters of the Brazilian leader are now scrambling ahead of a floor vote in the lower house of Parliament.
lead_paragraph: Supporters of the Brazilian leader are now scrambling ahead of a floor vote in the lower house of Parliament.
